divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a traffic light south-bound on MacDade Boulevard and was going to make a left turn onto Amosland Road. While I was waiting for the light to turn green, my eyes were scanning the area then I looked up at the sky. That's when I saw something I never saw before, a white, brightly lit "flying saucer". I quickly looked at traffic light to see if it had yet turned green and then refocused my eyes to where I had seen the UFO but, to my chagrin, the UFO had disappeared from sight.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Glenolden
There were no other sightings in Glenolden on or around June 20th 1989
Summary: Looked up and saw a brightly lit "flying saucer"
